reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and perfect for summer wear, with a roomy fit and high-quality construction. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it pairs well with different base layers, and customers appreciate its soft texture and comfort. They like how it dresses up shorts and complements various outfits. Regarding size, while some it's perfect, others mention it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & well made
items.body: Oh, so cute, well-made, and does not have a smell, which is great! I got a size L, and I am 5'8 "and 180 pounds, and it fits perfectly, slightly oversized, which is very cute for the style to fall off the shoulder. It is lightweight yet falls nicely on the body with the neck hole slouching off the shoulder in a shylish manner. It is a bit pricey, although well-made and worth the price tag. Read more
items.author: Cadence

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT, IT'S WORTH IT!
items.body: Bought one for my daugher for her birthday, it is so cute on her I had to have one for myself. Great quality, soft material, fits as expected (M), breathable, color is as expected. Great for casual wear with shorts, over bathing suit, I am wearing mine today with a scoop neck tee in baby blue and jeans to work. Read more
items.author: terralee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have This Top! 5 Stars
items.body: LOVE this top! So comfy and versatile, can be dressed up or down. Very lightweight and true to size. I wear a Medium and bought same and it is still a little oversized which is what I wanted. It is more of a Camel color and pretty. I would definitely hand wash and air dry. I did not steam it in photo, this is straight out of the shipping bag. I like this top so much that I purchased it in two more colors. Black and white. Staples for my wardrobe. I did however send the white back because it was not a true white. More of an off yellow. Not even cream. Disappointed with that one. Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and keeps me just warm enough with overheating me
items.body: I see that lots of people complained about this product, but I love it. So far I do not have any complaints. Yes the material is delicate, so treat it as such. Also if you look at the picture , the sweater is tucked into the jeans and if you look at all the pictures, it shows you exactly what it looks like completely untucked - yes it has a square bottom. If it unravels I will adjust my review, but so far so good. I really like this and I bought it in multiple colors. It actually is cute and it does hang off my shoulder and it does look like the picture. It is just warm enough, without overheating me. It's nice and see through so you can wear something underneath and still see it Super comfortable. I love this top. Read more
items.author: Lizbeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Summer Sweater Is a Good Purchase.
items.body: Perfect summer top. Very comfortable and stylish. I washed on Delicate Cycle, cold water, dried just a few minutes, air dried the rest of the way, came out perfect, did not shrink. Looks great over maxi summer dress. Good purchase. Read more
items.author: kattie ashby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and texture, fun to wear
items.body: Adorable, nice looking, good sizing. Very chic and gives a feeling of being out on the town. Read more
items.author: J. M. Alterio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Very cute. Can dress it up or down! Read more
items.author: Autumn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but I returned it
items.body: Material was stiff. No real stretch to the fabric. Color was great. Fits as expected. It was tempting to keep it but I just didn't love it. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Birmingham

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Blue Stripe, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Light French Beige, Navy Blue, Orchid Bouquet, Dark Green, Light Blue, Rose Red, Ashleigh Blue, Desert Palm, Fiery Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
